If Greed is insurmountable, then you must live with it. Such was the primary lesson of the drachiri empire, and you too return to this core lesson. The world is built despite these flaws, and achievements can be made in spite of â€“ or because of it.

During your daily preparations, choose acid, fire, electricity, mental, cold or poison. While you have Zeal, you have resistance 15 to the chosen damage type for the day. In addition, you can change the damage type from your Zealous strikes or any Dervish feat that allows you to deal spirit damage to match that of this selection. Finally, you gain a fly speed equal to your Speed.

Special: If you are aligned to a particular type of dragon, such as through a draconic exemplar or bloodline, if you pick the same damage type as your dragon your resistance increases to 25.
